content.label: This is a great game! Playing it all the time!!

title.label: It’s a SHADOW of it’s former self!

content.label: First let me start by saying I’ve been playing this game since day one, and for years now the game has been great.  While it does tend to get a bit boring after you reach the top level, I’ve dropped hundreds of guns and different outfits, camo.  Sure I haven’t been playing as much as I used to, because the devs haven’t added anything new in a very very long time.  Looks like they don’t really care about the game much any more, and it shows. No new content or missions in years aside from a generic set of missions.  Then I come to the multiplayer and dungeons.  I was surprised recently that they actually took care most of the issues plaguing multiplayer.  Then slowly, but surely that goes downhill.  Now you can’t even complete a multiplayer mission, it restarts 15 times or more, then just kicks you off!  No wonder everyone keeps leaving the game!  A shame too,  this was one of my favorites!
Ok so I got this game like almost a month ago and when I went on today it deleted all my data I tried signing in but it would work

Was 5 stars until I beat Hive Mind fourteen times only to get one legendary pants and one legendary shotgun.  Where is Tesla?  I have beaten this thing FOURTEEN times and have gotten nothing but two legendary items (NOT Tesla) and a ton of unneeded and unwanted epic items.  RIP-OFF!

This game dude this game (obviously if you play Halo) is taking Halo’s designs then either change it up a tiny bit or mush it together with another Halo design especially the weapons I mean bruh pause the trailer ok now do you see it IT’S A LAGGY MESS LIKE THE REST OF THE GAME! The only reason I installed this game is to see more of the guns and designs and see how much of Halo’s designs they copied......it’s a lot. Also as soon as I finish writing this review I will immediately deinstall this copy cat laggy mess that some people call a “game” how ever I do not think this product deserves that title. title.label: Horrible lagging Game loot is a joke

content.label: First off I been playing for a two months and I can start by saying this is the worse lagging game I ever seen a alien can kill you turned around all the way and all you guys can say is send me video proof like we actually have time for that we waste our time doing dungeons arenas for trashy loot and gear. The other part is the ascendancy and pve area where I don’t care I know what I’m seeing I’m not going to listen to a lie in disguise someone I met already showed me on this game you can hack mod and pretty much do what you want if your a newbie trust me this game will piss you off and have you breaking your cellphone into pieces. The game developers do respond I will give them that but as for expanding the story mode 👎the red planet I have been hearing has been locked for like 3 years now going in no development also hackers are still in the game they refuse to remove them some of them have to be nice I heard what a crock. Then even while specked to luck wasting your time you get nothing this game is really needs help in going the right direction

I’ve played a couple missions in this game, I’ve encountered 2 problems so far. 

1) Audio
      There is some sort of problem with the audio, it sounds weird and sort of muffled when using headphones or earbuds(I use AirPod pros so my earbuds are not the problem) Also when trying to use my phone speakers, it’s very quite and still has that muffled sound to it.

2) Dedicated aim button
      It doesn’t feel like a shooter if it doesn’t have the proper controls, this game needs a dedicated aim button. I can’t tell you how many times I go looking for the aim button, but it’s not there. What would make it even better is if you can add a custom layout creator.

Don’t get me wrong, this is a great game. It’s a very beautiful game with its console like graphics. It has a great story so far, and has a great player base. Just did those to problems and this game would instantly be a five star.
